question: Darrell Posey used a multispecies ethnographic approach to study the relationship of the Kayapó people of central Brazil with what animal?

answers.text: He explored the relationships that the Kayapó people of central Brazil had with jaguars and how those relationships shaped their perception of themselves as human.
He explored the relationships that the Kayapó people of central Brazil had with local insects and how those relationships shaped their perception of themselves as human.
He explored the relationships that the Kayapó people of central Brazil with the beaver and how those relationships shaped their perception of themselves as human.
He explored the relationships that the Kayapó people of central Brazil had with frogs and how those relationships shaped their perception of themselves as human.
